transArray.content: The location is easy to find, and there is free parking at the door. It is very close to the newly opened Chaoyang Railway Station, just a few minutes' walk away, which is very convenient. The service is also great. There is also a robot that can deliver food and a self-service washing machine and dryer. I am very satisfied!

Your satisfaction is the biggest motivation for our work. Hanting Chaoyang Railway Station has always provided the most sincere and enthusiastic service to bring every guest a home away from home experience. Your smile is our best reward. Thank you for your choice and look forward to it. See you again and wish you a happy life!
